RelatedSentence: JUBA , South Sudan , May 19 ( UPI ) -- The United Nations reported three more confirmed deaths from cholera in South Sudan on Monday .
South Sudan 's Ministry of Health said it was prepared for the cholera outbreak .
So we had trained our staff in all the States and we have pre-positioned cholera kits and acute diarrhea kits .
So we had trained our staff in all the States and we have pre-positioned cholera kits and acute diarrhea kits .
We have trained rapid response teams in the States and we were watching , monitoring the situation so we were prepared .
We have trained rapid response teams in the States and we were watching , monitoring the situation so we were prepared .
Despite the government 's assertion that it had prepared for the outbreak , UNICEF Representative in South Sudan Jonathan Veitch blamed the government for its role in the health crisis .
The severity of the cholera outbreak is just one manifestation of a country failing its children ...
Cholera puts even more strain on the most vulnerable , whose health is already compromised by a nutritional crisis .
Following the outbreak , UNICEF said it helped set up a Cholera Treatment Center at the Juba Teaching Hospital .
